languages.text: "Донесение со средних палуб, Лорд-капитан. Сразу после трансляции из варпа по вокс-каналам прошли сообщения о появлении на палубах черных созданий, возникших, если верить свидетелям, прямо из теней. Судя по донесениям, их интересовал не экипаж, а ваш ручной ксенос, Маражай".

traits.locale_text: "Донесение со средних палуб, Лорд-капитан. Сразу после трансляции из варпа по вокс-каналам прошли сообщения о появлении на палубах черных созданий, возникших, если верить свидетелям, прямо из теней. Судя по донесениям, их интересовал не экипаж, а ваш ручной ксенос, Маражай".

languages.text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."
languages.original_text: "Донесение со средних палуб, Лорд-капитан. Сразу после трансляции из варпа по вокс-каналам прошли сообщения о появлении на палубах черных созданий, возникших, если верить свидетелям, прямо из теней. Судя по донесениям, их интересовал не экипаж, а ваш ручной ксенос, Маражай".

traits.locale_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after the broadcast from the warp there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai that interested them."

"A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after the broadcast from the warp there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai that interested them."

"A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

"A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

"A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

languages.text: "Ein Bericht von den mittleren Decks, Lord Captain. Unmittelbarer nach unserem Transfer aus dem Warp gab es in den Vox-Kanälen Berichte über schwarze Kreaturen, die überall auftauchen. Die Zeugen berichten, sie seien direkt aus den Schatten gekommen und seien hinter Eurem zahmen Xenos Marazhai her."
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Bericht von den mittleren Decks, Lord Captain. Unmittelbarer nach unserem Transfer aus dem Warp gab es in den Vox-Kanälen Berichte über schwarze Kreaturen, die überall auftauchen. Die Zeugen berichten, sie seien direkt aus den Schatten gekommen und seien hinter Eurem zahmen Xenos Marazhai her."

languages.text: “中层甲板传来报告，舰长大人。我们从亚空间跳跃出来之后，音阵频道就开始报告，说某种黑色生物到处出没。目击者称，这些生物直接从阴影中出现，而且对您的异形宠物玛拉斋很感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: “中层甲板传来报告，舰长大人。我们从亚空间跳跃出来之后，音阵频道就开始报告，说某种黑色生物到处出没。目击者称，这些生物直接从阴影中出现，而且对您的异形宠物玛拉斋很感兴趣。”

languages.text: « Nous avons reçu des renseignements des ponts intermédiaires est arrivé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Dès que nous avons quitté le Warp, des rapports sur les canaux vox ont commencé à mentionner des créatures noires apparaissant partout. Les témoignages affirment qu'elles ont surgi des ombres, et qu'elles cherchaient votre xénos apprivoisé, Marazhai. »
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons reçu des renseignements des ponts intermédiaires est arrivé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Dès que nous avons quitté le Warp, des rapports sur les canaux vox ont commencé à mentionner des créatures noires apparaissant partout. Les témoignages affirment qu'elles ont surgi des ombres, et qu'elles cherchaient votre xénos apprivoisé, Marazhai. »

languages.text: «Informe de la cubierta central, Lord Capitán. Inmediatamente tras nuestra salida de la disformidad, se han producido informes en los canales de voco sobre criaturas negras por todas partes. Según testigos oculares, surgieron de las sombras. Les interesaba su xenos mascota, Marazhai».
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: «Informe de la cubierta central, Lord Capitán. Inmediatamente tras nuestra salida de la disformidad, se han producido informes en los canales de voco sobre criaturas negras por todas partes. Según testigos oculares, surgieron de las sombras. Les interesaba su xenos mascota, Marazhai».

languages.text: 「中層デッキから報告です、ロード・キャプテン。歪みからの転移直後、至る所に出現している黒い生物に関してヴォクス通信で報告がありました。目撃者はそれらが影から現れたと言っており、陛下が変われている異種族のマラズハイに興味を示しているとのことです」
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: 「中層デッキから報告です、ロード・キャプテン。歪みからの転移直後、至る所に出現している黒い生物に関してヴォクス通信で報告がありました。目撃者はそれらが影から現れたと言っており、陛下が変われている異種族のマラズハイに興味を示しているとのことです」

languages.text: "Orta güverteden rapor geldi Lord Kaptan. Voks kanallarından, öteboyut geçişimizin hemen ardından etrafta ortaya çıkan siyah yaratıklara dair raporlar alıyoruz. Görgü tanıklarına göre doğrudan gölgelerden çıkıyorlarmış. İlgilendikleri şey de evcil zenonuz Marazhai'mış."
languages.original_text: "A report from the middle decks, Lord Captain. Immediately after our translation from the warp, there were reports on the vox-channels about black creatures appearing all over the place. The witness accounts claim they emerged straight from the shadows, and it was your pet xenos Marazhai they were interested in."

traits.locale_text: "Orta güverteden gelen bir rapor var Lord Kaptan. Voks kanallarından, öteboyut geçişimizin hemen ardından etrafta ortaya çıkan siyah yaratıklara dair raporlar alıyoruz. Görgü tanıklarına göre direkt olarak gölgelerden çıkıyorlarmış ve ilgilendikleri şey, evcil zenonuz Marazhai'mış."
